name: banani-bns
description: JS/TS library for the Banano cryptocurrency's currently unofficial Banano Name System (BNS)

scripts.docs: typedoc --name bns --entryPoints ./main.ts && echo bns.prussia.dev > ./docs/CNAME && cp -r ./browser_test ./docs/browser_test && cp ./bns-browser.js ./docs/bns-browser.js
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run docs && npm run browser
